# 应用概率统计基础及算法（于江生）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yingyong-gailv-tongji-jichu-ji-suanfa-yujiangsheng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yingyong-gailv-tongji-jichu-ji-suanfa-yujiangsheng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yingyong-gailv-tongji-jichu-ji-suanfa-yujiangsheng
yingyong-gailv-tongji-jichu-ji-suanfa-yujiangsheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yingyong-gailv-tongji-jichu-ji-suanfa-yujiangsheng
yingyong-gailv-tongji-jichu-ji-suanfa-yujiangsheng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
